mapper.select: select rentinfo.* ,useraccount,brand,unitprice from rentinfo inner join userinfo on userinfo.userid = rentinfo.userid inner join carinfo on carinfo.carid = rentinfo.carid

select rentid,trade_no,rentinfo.userid,rentinfo.carid,to_char(rentaltime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as rentaltime,to_char(returntime,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as returntime,amount,startlng,startlat,endlng,endlat,isplay,useraccount,brand,unitprice from rentinfo inner join userinfo on userinfo.userid = rentinfo.userid inner join carinfo on carinfo.carid = rentinfo.carid where rentinfo.rentid = #{rentid}

select rentinfo.* ,useraccount,brand,unitprice from rentinfo inner join userinfo on userinfo.userid = rentinfo.userid inner join carinfo on carinfo.carid = rentinfo.carid where rentinfo.userid = #{userid}

select rentinfo.* ,useraccount,brand,unitprice from rentinfo inner join userinfo on userinfo.userid = rentinfo.userid inner join carinfo on carinfo.carid = rentinfo.carid where rentinfo.carid = #{carid}
select c.brand,sum(r.amount) as grossamount from carinfo c left join rentinfo r on c.carid = r.carid group by c.brand order by sum(r.amount) desc

select * from( select brand as brand, sum(usernum) as usernum from carinfo INNER JOIN (select carid,count(*) as usernum from rentinfo group by carid) t on t.carid = carinfo.carid group by brand ) t order by t.usernum desc
